title: Real-time rendering of extended fractional view integral photography.
abstract: A novel real-time visualization system for integral photography is demonstrated, in which autostereoscopic animation of a CG character with not only horizontal but also vertical parallax can be displayed. The character on the screen can be moved with a keyboard or a mouse. In this study, we improved the rendering speed considerably by using the GPU of a PC and achieved the real-time processing by introducing an algorithm suitable for shader.
